author: pierred
msg: Keep release notes up to date so people that download the nightly know
exactly where it stands with respect to the latest official release.

author: pierred
msg: [<fmt:requestEncoding> doesn't work with tag handler pooling enabled]
we derive from 'value'). This fixes the problem triggered by tag pooling.

author: pierred
msg: If a setter method does not exist, we now throw a JspException with a proper
error message, rather than a NullPointerException.

author: pierred
msg: We now reset locCtxt to null when bundle not specified explicitely
